DESC: A format representing the Rider-Waite Tarot Deck.

twist.DESC: The unique style of this tarot deck.
twist.DATA: based on the themes, ideas and names from Homer's Odyssey

aesthetic.DESC: The aesthetic of this tarot deck.
aesthetic.DATA: Use a Pre-Raphealite illustration style as if my Rosetti or Morris to draw the requested art, characterized by minute description of detail, a luminous palette of bright colors, and subject matter of from poetry and medieval legends and tales, with an aesthetic of beauty for its own sake, archaic compositions, intensely sharp focus—which, with an absence of shadows, flattened the depicted forms—and the stark coloration. Do not include any text titles or captions.

deck.DESC: All cards in the Tarot Deck

wheeloffortune.DESC: The Wheel of Fortune Tarot Card

fool.image.DESC: The image on the Fool Tarot Card
PROMPTS: Draw a unique image of the fool Tarot Card but named §fool.name§ representing the ideas of §fool.fortune§.

fool.name.DESC: The name of the Fool Tarot Card
PROMPTS: Give me your single BEST unique new name for the Fool Tarot Card. DO NOT Explain, do not provide multiple options, do not include punctuation. ONLY GIVE ME YOUR BEST SHORT NAME for this very particular version of the arcana.

fool.fortune.DESC: The fortune associated with the Fool Tarot Card
fool.fortune.DATA: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a leap of faith
